cast.overview: Two competing lawyers join forces to sue a prestigious law firm for AIDS discrimination. As their unlikely friendship develops their courage overcomes the prejudice and corruption of their powerful adversaries.
cast.title: Philadelphia

details.biography: Diane Luckey, known professionally as Q Lazzarus (1960-2022), was an American singer. She is best known for her 1988 song "Goodbye Horses", which became a cult classic after being prominently featured in a scene from Jonathan Demme's 1991 film The Silence of the Lambs.
details.name: Q Lazzarus
